body_html:
@arunmandal53 Thanks. I will try to build the 1.5 version on Windows 10.
But in your webiste there is written that "Currently, SSE or other are not supported by cl (C/CPP compiler came with visual studio 2015) only AVX and AVX2 supported.". Where did you take this information from?
For example, here it says that it is supported at least since VS2005. Are you referring to TS Windows implementation in particular?
